title: Aadhaar QR Scanner
description: Aadhaar QR Code Scanner is official mobile application developed by Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) to provide facility of reading and validating the data present in QR code shown on eaadhaar and printed aadhaar card. The QR Code that is generated in e-aadhaar and aadhaar card is digitally signed by UIDAI and this application can read the QR Code to  show the masked aadhaar number, Name, Date of Birth, Gender, Address and Photograph of the resident. Post showing the data, the application will also validate the information against the signature and show it as “Aadhaar Data Verified”.
descriptionHTML: Aadhaar QR Code Scanner is official mobile application developed by Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) to provide facility of reading and validating the data present in QR code shown on eaadhaar and printed aadhaar card. The QR Code that is generated in e-aadhaar and aadhaar card is digitally signed by UIDAI and this application can read the QR Code to  show the masked aadhaar number, Name, Date of Birth, Gender, Address and Photograph of the resident. Post showing the data, the application will also validate the information against the signature and show it as “Aadhaar Data Verified”.
summary: Aadhaar QR Code Scanner is UIDAI’s approved app to validate aadhaar QR Code.
developerAddress:

comments: Scanning timed out showing everytime app not working. Don't know this app is not working or someone hacked my phone who doesn't want me to see any result. Intentionally interfering in my work. What is the reason?
After Scanning from a from distance it's working. get out from the app and try again, then it will work. ❤️
I rated 1 star because there is no option for zero... Worst app I have ever used... Scanned time out showing every time....
Doesn't work at all. Tried every possible way to scan. Poor app.
Not able to scan .. tried several times.. Waste of time
